item.title: Difference between |xam and European methods of articulation
item.summary: The |xam talk with the body of their tongue, whereas the Europeans speak with the tip of their tongue.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-29
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
